fullForm: Staff Selection Commission Combined Higher Secondary Level
eligibility: Candidates must have passed 10+2 (Higher Secondary) or equivalent examination from a recognized board or university.
negativeMarking: 0.50 marks for each wrong answer in Tier-I
coursesLinked: Clerical and Data Entry posts in various Central Government Ministries, Departments, and Offices

faqs.question: What is the minimum educational qualification required for SSC CHSL?
faqs.answer: Candidates must have passed 10+2 (Higher Secondary) or equivalent examination from a recognized board or university.
